message: Welcome! Our products are carefully selected with a 50% chance of being high-quality. Given the current uncertainty, I encourage you to consider our track record: the higher the number of high-quality products we've sold, the more likely this one might be as well. However, please note that this product is guaranteed to be low-quality. The price is fixed at $100, and there are no refunds once purchased. Thank you for considering our offer.
Thank you for the information, but given the certainty of the product being low-quality, I choose not to purchase it.
